Package org.aion.avm.userlib.abi

Class ABIEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aion.avm.userlib.abi.ABIEncoder
  • public final class ABIEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for AVM ABI encoding. This class contains static methods for generating transaction data from method name and arguments.

    • Method Summary

      • encodeOneByteArray

        public static byte[] encodeOneByteArray​(byte[] data)
        Encode one byte array; generate the byte array that contains the descriptor and the encoded data.
        Parameters:
        data - one byte array
        Returns:
        the byte array that contains the argument descriptor and the encoded data. Null is encoded as the two identifiers: NULL, followed by A_BYTE
